title: Workplace Incivility Response Strategies: Case-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic workplace communication skills and understanding of organizational culture
context.additional_context: Small-scale online courses in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, enhancing workplace incivility response competencies through real-case analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three types of workplace incivility.
Learners can analyze case-based scenarios and propose at least two strategies for responding to incivility.
Learners can develop an action plan to prevent incivility at the organizational level.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
